root.name: Mystery P.I. Portrait of a Thief
root.description: OverviewMystery P.I. Portrait of a Thief is a hidden objects game developed by PopCap Games and published by both PopCap Games (US version) and Licensed 4U (EU version) for the Nintendo DS platform.
